category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA84_referencelinkext_2_itemtype_map
preference.preference_description: This option can be used to assign custom item types to Reference Link files created through TCAA. Possible values (type = string, multiple values): Option row format: <file extension pattern> = <Item type> where <file extension pattern> supports wildcards. Example: *.*=Document => all the not explicitly declared Reference Link items will be created as type Document *.bmp =MEResource => the *.bmp files will create items of type MEResource *.pdf=Requirement => the *.pdf files will create items of type Requirement
